connectorAttributes.undefined.SQL:
Select			
ur.Applicationid			
,Source = 'Assigned Role'			
,Role = ur.Code			
,RoleDescription = ur.Description			
,UserRoleInactive = ur.Inactive			
--,urf.featureid			
,UserRoleFeatureDenied =urf.denied			
,FeatureCode = f.code			
,FeatureDescription = f.description			
,FeatureInactive = f.Inactive			
,uru.Userid			
,UserName = isnull(u.lastname + ', ','') + isnull(firstname,'')			
,u.EmailAddress		
,u.EmployeeNumber
,UserTypeCode = 			
				case when usertypecode = 'A' then 'Adjuster'
				when usertypecode = 'B' then 'Broker'
				when usertypecode = 'C' then 'Clerical'
				when usertypecode = 'I' then 'Insurer'
				when usertypecode = 'N' then 'Insured'
				when usertypecode = 'X' then 'Administrator'
				ELSE '?'
				END
,UserInactive = u.inactive					
from userrolefeature as urf			
left join userrole as ur on urf.userroleid = ur.id			
	left join userroleuser as uru on ur.id = uru.userroleid		
left join feature as f on urf.featureid = f.id			
left join [user] as u on uru.userid = u.id			
where 			
	ur.ApplicationID = 'cms2'		
	and u.Inactive = 0		
	and u.UserTypeCode in ('a','c','x')		
			--#NAME?
			--#NAME?
			---- C
			--#NAME?
			--#VALUE!
			--#NAME?
UNION			
Select				
ur.Applicationid				
,Source = 'Assigned Role'				
,Role = ur.Code				
,RoleDescription = ur.Description				
,UserRoleInactive = ur.Inactive				
--,urf.featureid				
,UserRoleFeatureDenied =urf.denied				
,FeatureCode = f.code				
,FeatureDescription = f.description				
,FeatureInactive = f.Inactive				
,uru.Userid				
,UserName = isnull(u.lastname + ', ','') + isnull(firstname,'')				
,u.EmailAddress				
,u.EmployeeNumber
,UserTypeCode =
			case when usertypecode = 'A' then 'Adjuster'
				when usertypecode = 'B' then 'Broker'
				when usertypecode = 'C' then 'Clerical'
				when usertypecode = 'I' then 'Insurer'
				when usertypecode = 'N' then 'Insured'
				when usertypecode = 'X' then 'Administrator'
				else '?'
				end
,UserInactive = u.inactive								
from userrolefeature as urf				
left join userrole as ur on urf.userroleid = ur.id				
	left join userroleuser as uru on ur.id = uru.userroleid			
left join feature as f on urf.featureid = f.id				
left join [user] as u on uru.userid = u.id				
where 				
	ur.ApplicationID = 'cms2'			
	and u.Inactive = 0			
	and u.UserTypeCode in ('a','c','x')			
			--#NAME?	Adjuster
			--#NAME?	Broker
			---- C	Clerical
			--#NAME?	Insurer
			--#VALUE!	Insured
			--#NAME?	Administrator
UNION				
select		
ApplicationID				
,Source = 'Assigned Feature'				
,Role = ''				
,RoleDescripton = ''				
,UserRoleInactive = ''				
,UserRoleFeatureDenied = ''				
,FeaturCode =  code				
,FeatureDescription = Description				
,FeatureInactive = f.Inactive				
,Userid				
,UserName = isnull(u.lastname + ', ','') + isnull(firstname,'')				
,u.EmailAddress	
,u.EmployeeNumber
,UserTypeCode =				
			case when usertypecode = 'A' then 'Adjuster'
				when usertypecode = 'B' then 'Broker'
				when usertypecode = 'C' then 'Clerical'
				when usertypecode = 'I' then 'Insurer'
				when usertypecode = 'N' then 'Insured'
				when usertypecode = 'X' then 'Administrator'
				else '?'
				end
,UserInactive = u.inactive				
from UserFeature as  uf				
right join feature as f on uf.featureid = f.id				
left join userrolefeature as urf on uf.featureid = urf.featureid				
left join [user] as u on uf.userid = u.id				
where applicationid = 'cms2' 				
	and urf.userroleid is null			
			and u.Inactive = 0	
	and u.UserTypeCode in ('a','c','x')			
			--#NAME?	Adjuster
			--#NAME?	Broker
			---- C	Clerical
			--#NAME?	Insurer
			--#VALUE!	Insured
			--#NAME?	Administrator
	Order By UserID ASC, Role ASC
connectorAttributes.home branch.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT name = CONCAT (bm.id
	,' - '
	,bm.name)
FROM [user] AS u
LEFT JOIN userbranch AS ub ON u.id = ub.userid
	AND homebranch = 1
LEFT JOIN branch bm ON bm.id = ub.branchid
	AND ub.homebranch = 1
WHERE u.inactive = 0
	AND u.usertypecode IN (
		'A'
		,'C'
		,'X'
		)
connectorAttributes.approval threshold.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT name = CONCAT (
		b.Name
		,' - '
		,ub.ApprovalThreshold
		)
FROM [dbo].[User] u
INNER JOIN [dbo].[UserBranch] ub ON u.ID = ub.UserID
INNER JOIN [dbo].[Branch] b ON ub.BranchID = b.ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[UserTypeCode] utc ON u.UserTypeCode = utc.Code
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[EmployeeGroupClass] egc ON u.EmployeeGroupClassCode = egc.Code
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[User] u2 ON b.ManagerID = u2.ID
WHERE u.Inactive = 0
	AND ub.Inactive = 0
	AND b.Inactive = 0
connectorAttributes.undefined.testConnSQL:
SELECT top 1 *
  FROM 
 [User]
  WHERE inactive = '0'
  and UserTypeCode in('A','C','X')
connectorAttributes.role.SQL:
Select distinct --top 1 			
ur.Applicationid			
,Source = 'Assigned Role'			
,Role = ur.Code			
,RoleDescription = ur.Description			
,UserRoleInactive = ur.Inactive			
--,urf.featureid			
,UserRoleFeatureDenied =urf.denied			
,FeatureCode = f.code			
,FeatureDescription = f.description			
,FeatureInactive = f.Inactive			
,uru.Userid			
,UserName = isnull(u.lastname + ', ','') + isnull(firstname,'')			
,u.EmailAddress		
,u.EmployeeNumber
,UserTypeCode = 			
				case when usertypecode = 'A' then 'Adjuster'
				when usertypecode = 'B' then 'Broker'
				when usertypecode = 'C' then 'Clerical'
				when usertypecode = 'I' then 'Insurer'
				when usertypecode = 'N' then 'Insured'
				when usertypecode = 'X' then 'Administrator'
				ELSE '?'
				END
,UserInactive = u.inactive					
from userrolefeature as urf			
left join userrole as ur on urf.userroleid = ur.id			
	left join userroleuser as uru on ur.id = uru.userroleid		
left join feature as f on urf.featureid = f.id			
left join [user] as u on uru.userid = u.id			
where 			
	ur.ApplicationID = 'cms2'		
	and u.Inactive = 0		
	and u.UserTypeCode in ('a','c','x')		
			--#NAME?
			--#NAME?
			---- C
			--#NAME?
			--#VALUE!
			--#NAME?
UNION			
Select distinct--top 1 				
ur.Applicationid				
,Source = 'Assigned Role'				
,Role = ur.Code				
,RoleDescription = ur.Description				
,UserRoleInactive = ur.Inactive				
--,urf.featureid				
,UserRoleFeatureDenied =urf.denied				
,FeatureCode = f.code				
,FeatureDescription = f.description				
,FeatureInactive = f.Inactive				
,uru.Userid				
,UserName = isnull(u.lastname + ', ','') + isnull(firstname,'')				
,u.EmailAddress				
,u.EmployeeNumber
,UserTypeCode =
			case when usertypecode = 'A' then 'Adjuster'
				when usertypecode = 'B' then 'Broker'
				when usertypecode = 'C' then 'Clerical'
				when usertypecode = 'I' then 'Insurer'
				when usertypecode = 'N' then 'Insured'
				when usertypecode = 'X' then 'Administrator'
				else '?'
				end
,UserInactive = u.inactive								
from userrolefeature as urf				
left join userrole as ur on urf.userroleid = ur.id				
	left join userroleuser as uru on ur.id = uru.userroleid			
left join feature as f on urf.featureid = f.id				
left join [user] as u on uru.userid = u.id				
where 				
	ur.ApplicationID = 'cms2'			
	and u.Inactive = 0			
	and u.UserTypeCode in ('a','c','x')			
			--#NAME?	Adjuster
			--#NAME?	Broker
			---- C	Clerical
			--#NAME?	Insurer
			--#VALUE!	Insured
			--#NAME?	Administrator
UNION				
select distinct 				
ApplicationID				
,Source = 'Assigned Feature'				
,Role = ''				
,RoleDescripton = ''				
,UserRoleInactive = ''				
,UserRoleFeatureDenied = ''				
,FeaturCode =  code				
,FeatureDescription = Description				
,FeatureInactive = f.Inactive				
,Userid				
,UserName = isnull(u.lastname + ', ','') + isnull(firstname,'')				
,u.EmailAddress	
,u.EmployeeNumber
,UserTypeCode =				
			case when usertypecode = 'A' then 'Adjuster'
				when usertypecode = 'B' then 'Broker'
				when usertypecode = 'C' then 'Clerical'
				when usertypecode = 'I' then 'Insurer'
				when usertypecode = 'N' then 'Insured'
				when usertypecode = 'X' then 'Administrator'
				else '?'
				end
,UserInactive = u.inactive				
from UserFeature as  uf				
right join feature as f on uf.featureid = f.id				
left join userrolefeature as urf on uf.featureid = urf.featureid				
left join [user] as u on uf.userid = u.id				
where applicationid = 'cms2' 				
	and urf.userroleid is null			
			and u.Inactive = 0	
	and u.UserTypeCode in ('a','c','x')			
			--#NAME?	Adjuster
			--#NAME?	Broker
			---- C	Clerical
			--#NAME?	Insurer
			--#VALUE!	Insured
			--#NAME?	Administrator
	Order By UserName ASC, Role ASC
connectorAttributes.testConnSQL:
SELECT top 1 *
  FROM 
 [User]
  WHERE inactive = '0'
  and UserTypeCode in('A','C','X')
connectorAttributes.user type.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT name = utc.description
	,Description
FROM [user] AS u
LEFT JOIN usertypecode AS utc ON u.UserTypeCode = utc.Code
WHERE
	u.inactive = 0
   and u.UserTypeCode in ('A','C','X')

connectorAttributes.Role.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT name = ur.code
	,Description
FROM userroleuser AS uru
LEFT JOIN userrole AS ur ON uru.userroleid = ur.id
LEFT JOIN [user] as u on u.id = uru. userid
WHERE
	u.inactive = 0
   and u.UserTypeCode in ('A','C','X')
connectorAttributes.feature.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT name = f.code
	,Description
FROM [user] AS u
LEFT JOIN userfeature AS uf ON u.id = uf.userid
LEFT JOIN feature AS f ON uf.featureid = f.id
WHERE
	u.inactive = 0
   and u.UserTypeCode in ('A','C','X')
connectorAttributes.Assigned Role.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT name = ur.code
	,Description
FROM userroleuser AS uru
LEFT JOIN userrole AS ur ON uru.userroleid = ur.id
LEFT JOIN [user] as u on u.id = uru. userid
WHERE
	u.inactive = 0
   and u.UserTypeCode in ('A','C','X')
